You'd think after all these years of practice I'd be able to drink wine without choking? Must try harder
Lovely long walk in the hills above #piha just me alone with my thoughts. I shouldn't be left alone with just my thoughts.
Late on the news but congrats to @AlisonBallance for the NY honour. Well done chook.

@HelenTheShark In my case the no-idea switch
Why's there always one light switch in a hotel room that doesn't seem to do anything?
I'm sure I'm sitting next to Mitchell from @ModernFam
To stay ahead of the game I've broken my New Year's resolutions already. One less thing to worry about.
What's happening at @guardian?Two stories today on Teresa May and @thegrandtour both quoting #mailonsunday as their source
John Glenn was the epitome of what a boy's hero should be and I couldn't get enough stories of him and other pioneers of space. RIP
